synopsis.text: Anri Hiiragi and Haruhi Kamizaka, two inseparable friends, attend a unique school that offers both regular and magical education. Haruhi, inspired by a mage who once saved her, is determined to master magic and find her savior to express her gratitude with a Valentine's chocolate. Meanwhile, Jun Watarase's life takes an unexpected turn when a magical mix-up transforms her into a girl. Overnight, she becomes the center of attention, her newfound charm drawing in every boy in school, leaving them besotted and seeking a kiss. As Jun navigates her new reality, she must deal with the unforeseen consequences of her transformation, which prove to be a little too powerful.
